casebody.data:
John M. Hoffman et al. v. Charles F. Harrington et al. Revivor of real action. O’Brien J. Atkinson for the motion. Geo. P. Voorheis against.

A writ of error in ejectment was dismissed because defendant was dead when the writ issued and the heirs had been brought in instead of the administrators as representatives of the deceased defendant.

Motion to dismiss writ.

Submitted and granted June 17.
